participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is creative and nurturing, always finding joy in building and caring for her home. She has a strong sense of responsibility and values her family deeply.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: George is independent and resourceful, with a passion for nature and sustainability. He has a laid-back attitude and a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: my name is george. i've zero family that i'm close to. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i am a bee farmer.
